name: docker-stash
description: A collection of strange functions, for development
author: dr-js

scripts.build-debian10-dev-core-cn-proxy: npm run build-proxy -- node source/debian10/build-core.js CN
scripts.build-debian10-dev-layer-cn-proxy: npm run build-proxy -- node source/debian10/build-layer.js bin-sshd CN
scripts.build-debian10-combo-push-cn-proxy: npm run build-proxy -- dr-dev --rsl build-debian10-cn docker-push-cn-only
scripts.fix-script-filemode: bash -c '(shopt -s globstar && chmod --changes +x source/**/*.sh && ls -al source/**/*.sh)'
scripts.tag-push: TAG="$(node -p "'v'+require('./package.json').version")" && git tag --force "$TAG" && git push --force origin "$TAG"
scripts.prepack: echo "Error: do not pack this package" && exit 1
